column1: 811511,Laundry Worker (General),,"Sort, wash, dry or iron fabric, linen and clothes

column5: Mark products, work pieces or equipment with identifying information
column7: Package products for storage or shipment
column9: Apply water or solutions to fabrics or apparel
column15: Inspect garments, fabrics or textile products for defects, damage or stains
column21: Safely handle chemicals for work applications
column23: Sort materials or products for processing, storing, shipping or grading
column27: Mount materials or work pieces onto production equipment
column29: Feed materials or products into or through equipment
column33: Maintain equipment or systems to ensure proper functioning
column37: Mix substances to create chemical solutions
column39: Count finished products or work pieces
column41: Answer customer questions about goods or services
column45: Test chemical or physical characteristics of materials or products
column49: Adjust fabrics or other materials during garment production or processing
column51: Compare physical characteristics of materials or products to specifications or standards
